content: free pattern to make your own cottagecore mushroom purse perfect for hobbit cosplays renfaire and more for this pattern you will need -worsted weight yarn size 4 i used red heart super saver in aran for the stem and ruffles about 1/2 skein and red heart super saver in cherry red about 1/2 skein for the top portion and then some scrap white yarn i had laying around for the spots -3 75mm crochet hook -yarn needle -9in zipper optional consider using a button or two if you don t use a zipper -scissors -sewing pins -stitch markers -fabric for the lining and matching thread optional -sewing needle or sewing machine optional -fiber fill abbreviations magic_ring- magic_ring increase- increase single_crochet twice in one stitch single_crochet- single_crochet decrease- decrease single_crochet two stitches together flo- front loops only single_crochet in the front loop of each st blo- back loops only single_crochet only in the back loop of each st fpsc- front post single_crochet single_crochet under the post of the sitch working through the front side of the piece chain- chain st- stitch half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet fo- finish off
